summary: This document is a set of notes from a September 2020 Zoom call with a witness, summarizing her allegations of an abusive relationship with Leon Black from 2010 to 2014, including rape and financial payments, her connection to Jeffrey Epstein, and her signing of an NDA.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Described as having an abusive relationship with the witness from 2010 to 2014, allegedly raping her in multiple locations and providing her with monthly payments. He is part of the 'Epstein and Leon Black circle'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as part of the social circle the witness entered; the witness met him and went to his house in Florida.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient or author of the notes regarding the telephone call with the New York ADA and the witness interview.

connections.description: Described as an abusive relationship from 2010 to 2014 where the witness alleges she was raped by Black and received monthly payments.
Referred to as being part of the same social circle ('Epstein and Leon Black circle').
The witness met Epstein and went to his house in Florida, indicating an acquaintance.

events.title: Abusive Relationship with Leon Black
events.description: The witness describes a multi-year abusive relationship with Leon Black during which she was raped in Manhattan, the Hamptons, upstate New York, and Westchester.

events.title: Financial Payments to Witness
events.description: The witness received $1 million and $20,000 monthly payments from Leon Black, described as a loan she didn't have to repay.

events.title: Witness Interview via Zoom
events.description: A witness was interviewed for about an hour via Zoom, detailing allegations against Leon Black and her connection to Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Signing of NDA
events.description: Leon Black had the witness sign a non-disclosure agreement at the conclusion of their relationship.

keyFacts: A witness alleges she was in an abusive relationship with financier Leon Black from 2010 to 2014, during which he raped her in multiple New York locations.
The witness received substantial financial benefits from Black, including a $1 million sum and $20,000 monthly payments characterized as a non-repayable loan.
The witness was part of the 'Epstein and Leon Black circle,' met Jeffrey Epstein, and visited his Florida house.
The relationship with Black became hostile when she stopped wanting to engage sexually, leading to threats and her belief she was being followed.
At the relationship's conclusion, Leon Black had the witness sign a non-disclosure agreement (NDA).
